BUSINESS Description of Business The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation, a Delaware corporation (NYSE symbol: BK), is a global company headquartered in New York, New York, with $52.1 trillion in assets under custody and/or administration and $2.0 trillion in assets under management as of Dec. 31, 2024. With its subsidiaries, BNY has been in business since 1784. We divide our businesses into three principal business segments: Securities Services, Market and Wealth Services and Investment and Wealth Management.
